tool.name: pullS3

param.name: region_id
param.dialogReference:
The abbreviation of the region whose data you would like to copy.

e.g. "AK" or "CRG"

param.name: access_key_id
param.dialogReference: You AWS Access Key ID. This generally starts with 'AKIA' and has 20 characters.

param.name: access_key
param.dialogReference: You AWS Secret Access Key. This generally has 40 characters.

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference:
The file location on your computer where you would like the data to be copied to.

Within this location, a 'Temp' folder and a folder named with the region's abbreviation, containing the copied data, will be created.

param.name: copy_whole
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether you would like to copy all of the available data for the given region.

This generally includes the following: "archydro" folder, "bc_layers" folder, "schema" folder (or region's FGDB), and the region's ".xml" file.

param.name: copy_whole_archydro
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether to copy the region's entire "archydro" folder.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region's folder.

This generally includes the following: region's HUC folders, named using their HUCIDs, and the "global.gdb"

param.name: copy_global
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether to copy the region's "global.gdb", found within the "archydro" folder.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region folder, or the entire "archydro" folder.

param.name: huc_folders
param.dialogReference:
A semi-colon delineated list of the HUC IDs of the desired HUC folders, found in the region's "archydro" folder.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region's folder, or the entire "archydro" folder.

e.g. "01234567;01234568"

param.name: copy_bc_layers
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether to copy the entire "bc_layers" folder.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region's folder.

param.name: copy_xml
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether to copy the region's .xml file, generally named "StreamStatsXX.xml" where "XX" is the region's abbreviation.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region's folder.

param.name: copy_schema
param.dialogReference:
Indicates whether to copy the region's "schema" folder containing the region's FGDB, or the FGDB itself, depending on what is in the bucket. The FGDB is generally named "XX_ss.gdb" where "XX" is the region's abbreviation.

This is not necessary if you are copying the entire region's folder.

tool.summary: This tool allows you to copy the data from the StreamStats S3 bucket onto your system to work on locally.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool allows you to copy regional data from the StreamStats S3 bucket onto your system to work on.
